Details.description: Server providing data for the ready-salted app.

GET /api.description: Serves up a json representation of all available endpoints

GET /api/users.description: Serves an array containing the details of all users, with password fields ommitted

GET /api/users/username.description: Serves a single user's details omitting password

GET /api/users/:username/password.description: Performs comparison between password on request body and password stored in corresponding document in users collection

GET /api/users/scores.description: Serves a list of all scores attached to documents in the user collection

POST /api/users.description: Accepts a json on request body and adds this as a new document on the users collection

DELETE /api/users/:username.description: Deletes a document from users collection with corresponding username

PATCH /api/users/:username.description: Updates fields on a document from users collection with the contents of the request body
